Subject: Pod Trouble

::Striker::

Striker looks over at Spears, noting that she was almost panicing. "Calm 
down, we-"

"Warning. Power level low."

Striker jerks his head toward the console as the computer reports this, 
walking toward it and pressing a few buttons. The pod shakes as the engines 
power down slightly, only regaining enough to keep going at a slow movement.

"We're not almost there. The trip just trippled," Striker says as the solar 
panels begin to gather energy, the Maximal sitting down.
